Returns the classification table that matches the classification used by the minimal "C" locale.

===Parameters===
(none)

===Return value===
A pointer to the first element in the classification table (which is an array of size {{tt|std::ctype&lt;char&gt;::table_size}}).

===Notes===
Default-constructed {{c|std::ctype&lt;char&gt;}} facets use this table for classification.
